virality_potential.justification: Provocative comparison between major cryptocurrencies likely to spark debates within crypto communities.

informative_value.justification: Opinion-based statement with no factual content or verifiable information.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral challenge format without explicit positive/negative emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Debates about crypto comparisons typically remain relevant for days in fast-moving markets.
